name: node-red-explorer
description: Take the output JSON from NodeRED export and convert it to NodeJS (sans RED) using Express for routing.

scripts.test: echo "No testing setup just yet, y'all."
scripts.list: cat package.json | python -c "import sys,json; print json.dumps(json.load(sys.stdin)['scripts'], indent=4)"

author: Neil G. Lindberg
